com.b2international.snowowl.datastore.tasks

Interface ITaskContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IGeneralAuthoringTaskContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SnomedGeneralAuthoringTaskContext, SnomedMappingRefSetAuthoringTaskContext, SnomedRefSetAuthoringTaskContext, SnomedTaskContext, TaskContext

    public interface ITaskContext
extends Cloneable, Serializable
    Cloneable and serializable representation of a task context.

    This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients. Clients should extend TaskContext instead.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String DELIMITER
      Reserved character, used as delimiter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITaskContext clone()
      As task context could be excessively used via property testers, which may disrupt the UI thread, we rather clone an existing instance instead of always create a new one via IConfigurationElement.createExecutableExtension(String).
      String getContextId()
      Returns with the unique ID of the task context.
      org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage getEPackage()
      Returns the EPackage instance specific for this TaskContext.
      String getLabel()
      Returns with the human readable name of the task context.
      ITaskContextBranchManagementPolicy getPolicy()
      Returns with the branch management policy for the task context.
      String getToolingId()
      Returns with the associated tooling ID of the task context.
      boolean isComponentScoped()
      Returns true, if the implementation is component scoped, false otherwise.
      boolean isMetadataPropertyProvider()
      Returns true when the terminology corresponding to this ITaskContext instance provides/supports meta data properties, otherwise false.

    • Field Detail

      • DELIMITER

        static final String DELIMITER
        Reserved character, used as delimiter. Cannot be used in getContextId().
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getToolingId

        String getToolingId()
        Returns with the associated tooling ID of the task context.

      • getLabel

        String getLabel()
        Returns with the human readable name of the task context.

      • getContextId

        String getContextId()
        Returns with the unique ID of the task context.

        NOTE: colons [:] are prohibited in the task context ID.

        See Also:
        DELIMITER

      • getPolicy

        ITaskContextBranchManagementPolicy getPolicy()
        Returns with the branch management policy for the task context.

      • isComponentScoped

        boolean isComponentScoped()
        Returns true, if the implementation is component scoped, false otherwise.
        Returns:

      • getEPackage

        org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EPackage getEPackage()
        Returns the EPackage instance specific for this TaskContext.
        Parameters:
        taskContext -
        Returns:

      • isMetadataPropertyProvider

        boolean isMetadataPropertyProvider()
        Returns true when the terminology corresponding to this ITaskContext instance provides/supports meta data properties, otherwise false.
        Returns:

      • clone

        ITaskContext clone()
            throws CloneNotSupportedException
        As task context could be excessively used via property testers, which may disrupt the UI thread, we rather clone an existing instance instead of always create a new one via IConfigurationElement.createExecutableExtension(String).

        }

        Throws:
        CloneNotSupportedException
